document_data.mainbody:
Wenda Wildeye was an infamous bandit and bloodforge mage operating out of the Serpent Valley in the Utter East during the time of the Bloodforge Wars (648â€“657 DR).
Wenda Wildeye used the Serpent Valley as a hideout and mustering area. While preparing for another raid, the leader of the Legendary Campaign came to put an end to the banditry.
